author: kraai
msg: (SVN_FIND_APACHE): Move parentheses next to macro name.

author: brane
msg: We decided some time ago to kill off this txn_checkpoint.

author: philip
msg: Fix some command line option inconsistencies I noticed while
(svn_cl__options): Remove quotes from "ARG" to match plain ARG.
SVN_CL__AUTH_OPTIONS.  Adjust the option order in a few places.
options to propdel, propedit, propget, proplist, propset and cat.

author: philip
msg: Make the access batons read the admin format file when opening a
directory to prevent unversioned directories being opened, this
is safer but slower.  Take up Grep Stein's suggested performance
improvement to regain some of the original speed, also cache
missing subdirs.  Overall 'svn status' is very marginally faster,
and it now handles unversioned subdirs that obstruct versioned
(svn_wc_adm_wc_format): Move to wc.h and rename svn_wc__adm_wc_format.
(svn_wc_adm_access_t missing): Static instance to represent missing
(do_open): Renamed from svn_wc_adm_open, add boolean under_construction
parameter.  Read format file before creating a lock.  Don't check node
type before descending into subdirs.  Record missing subdirs.
(svn_wc_adm_open, svn_wc__adm_pre_open): New wrappers that call do_open.
integer format directly rather than via a parameter.
determine if a directory is missing.
(add_or_open_file): Remove svn_wc_check_wc call since having an
access baton means that check has already passed.  Remove comment
(check_wc_root): Expect parent open to fail if it is not versioned.
a test where an unversioned directory obstructs a versioned directory.
